Utilities for the map related to exports.

download_map_image.Rd

Functions:

  • download_map_image: Download the map as an image. Download the map as an image.

Usage

download_map_image(proxy, filename, format = "png", width = 800, height = 600)

Arguments

proxy

The map proxy object created by mapProxy().

filename

The name of the file to save the image as.

format

The format of the image. Default is "png".

width

The width of the image in pixels. Default is 800.

height

The height of the image in pixels. Default is 600.

Value

    The map proxy object for chaining.

Note

THIS IS A WIP !!!
